channel.title: Darren Lemke on jverkamp.com
channel.description: Recent content in Darren Lemke on jverkamp.com

item.title: Shazam!
item.description: That was not really what I expected. On one hand, it’s got the heart of a super hero origin story, with Billy Batson gaining powers, learning to use them (and not lose himself or his friends/family while doing so), and fighting the big bad.

item.title: Turbo
item.description: There’s a saying in science fiction: you get one free pass; one thing that you’re allowed to just let the audience assume. This could be the existence of the warp drive / replicators in Star Trek or the force in Star Wars.

item.title: Jack the Giant Slayer
item.description: It’s hard to count the number of things that went sideways in Jack the Giant Slayer.
